org.openadaptor.auxil.processor.xml
Class XmlValidator

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.Component
      org.openadaptor.auxil.processor.xml.XmlValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Administrable, IComponent, IDataProcessor
public class XmlValidator
extends Component
implements IDataProcessor

Validates each record (assumed to be an XML document in string form) against the schema defined in the configuration file.

By default the schema URL is verified during the initialisation phase. For web based schemas this may take a while. You can turn this feature off by setting the forcingURLValidation property to be false

This processor uses the Xerces parser and requires the following jars to be in the classpath - xerces.jar, xml-apis.jar

Author:
Russ Fennell

process

public java.lang.Object[] process(java.lang.Object data)
Take the record, ensure it's a string and validate it against the schema defined in the config file.

Specified by:
process in interface IDataProcessor
Parameters:
data - the XML to be validated
Returns:
Object[] with zero or more records, resulting from the processing operation.
Throws:
